text: 4.7: Ais 26.3; Zo 14.27; Ro 5.1; Kor 3.15Nde maaŋ muunga, Fhe Bakɨme nden muuŋgirim, nde ndavi mbɨrav kɨrga. Fhe Bakɨme nza ndɨɨi ndava mɨɨtɨk, ana guigira bigɨna vhuuŋ ma. Nza gumgi, nza ana nɨɨŋge kaŋgirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mba tɨv, nde guigira Krais Zisas phorgɨp kɨv, nden ndavi gum ndɨkndɨgi guigira nzerara kɨrga.
